mapper.insert: insert into d_payment(userid, orgid, d_boardnum, d_cost, type) values(#{userid}, #{orgid}, #{d_boardnum}, #{d_cost}, 'p');
mapper.select: select coalesce(sum(d_cost), 0) from d_payment where d_boardnum=#{d_boardnum}
select coalesce(sum(d_cost), 0) from d_payment where orgid=#{orgid}
